CustomField.inlineHelpText: Internal visit: The field 'Visit Location' is initially prefilled with the address of the head office (DH or SAG) after saving the record. This address can be modified afterwards. External visit: The field 'Visit Location' is initially prefilled with the address of the account (if an account is linked to the visit) after saving the record. This address can be modified afterwards.
CustomField.label: Visit Location
